body:
@ALTree Hm, I didn't know about the extra capacity hint. Maybe, if possible, for those who do not care about the actual capacity hint, define a constant `DEFAULT_CAP` or something along that lines to hint that it should use the default. So, it'd become `make(map[string]int, DEFAULT_CAP, CONCURRENT)`.

Are there any other arguments as well that can supplied to it? I've never actually seen anyone use a capacity hint for map, but it makes sense that there is one.
